text:
Assertions and PostProcessors apply to the current sample.

Child samples are ignored (unless the test element specifically processes them - e.g. Save Results to file).

It would be useful to add options to apply Assertions/Post-Processors to the parent and/or child samples.

Child samples may be very different from the parent, so assertions that apply to the children may not make sense for the parent (and vice versa).

Also, child samples may be very different from each other - e.g. embedded HTML resources may be images or css(text)
